productData.shortDescription: Capture every moment with the Polaroid Snap Touch Instant Digital Camera. Smartphone compatible, this Bluetooth enabled camera prints 2" x 3" full color photos and has burst and photo booth modes, HD videos and selfies to make your photos memorable.
productData.longDescription:
• Wired headset with mic and control Wired, Earpods with 3.5mm headphone plug ,fine quality sound for all smartphones
  • Earpods with 3.5mm headphone plug, Wired headset with mic and control Wired Headset with Mic (White, In the Ear)
  • Make Calls and receive easily Listen to Music Superb sound quality Deep bass and effective noise isolation Built-in microphone for handsfree calls Noise Cancelling Control and Mic
  • Listen To Music and Control Calls In Quality Stereo Sound with This Comfort Handsfree Headset Featuring An Design
  • Powerful, deep, rich bass, crystal clear sound and audiophile quality. With excellent Noise Isolation that effectively blocks ambient noise, you can listen to your music comfortably without hearing fatigue. (Assorted Colour)
